archimate:Principle.name: Sovrin Steward Agreement
archimate:Principle.documentation: The legal contract between the Sovrin Foundation and a Steward. The Sovrin Steward Agreement incorporates the Sovrin Governance Framework and the Sovrin Glossary as appendices.
